title: Re: Uh
content:
No. Well, actually, I forgot about it.
It used to be used, but now, people got lazy, and nothing was good enough to be nominated. (ok, I know thats not entirely true, but the community isn't as active as it used to be)-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Uh
content:
The problem is organisation. There's plenty of activity, but when something gets posted it eventually gets buried beneath everything else, and the people who don't visit very often miss out on many of the goings-on, which is then interpreted as "lack of interest", which produces less incentive to either create new projects or post about existing ones.

I've been working for a few months on something that will hopefully improve this situation, but I've still got a lot to learn before it'll be useful.
